summary:
If you’re paying $20/month for ChatGPT Plus just to use the API, you’re vastly overpaying. 
In November 2024, I used OpenAI’s GPT 4o model via their API 218 times — over seven times per day.  — and it cost me exactly $0...
title: OpenAI’s 4o model cost me a whopping 62 cents last month

summary: I decided that in 2025, I'm going to stop tracking my media consumption online
title: Year of Not Tracking
